---
title: "A list of blog posts about brms"
---

Since its foundation, several people have blogged about my R package **brms**, which allows to fit Bayesian multilevel models using Stan. This page is intended to provide links to those resources.

## Blogs and Websites

- [Blog of Solomon Kurz](https://solomonkurz.netlify.app/blog/)
- [Blog of Matti Vuorre](https://vuorre.netlify.app/blog.html)
- [Blog of Ladislas Nalborczyk](https://lnalborczyk.github.io/)
- [Blog of Markus Gesmann](https://magesblog.com/post/)
- [Blog of Jonas Kristoffer Lindelov](https://lindeloev.net/stats/)
- [Blog of Kristoffer Magnusson](https://rpsychologist.com/posts)
- [Blog of Henrik Singmann](http://singmann.org/blog/)
- [Blog of Daniel Luedecke](https://strengejacke.wordpress.com/)
- [Blog of Wayne Folta](https://thinkinator.com/)
- [Statistical Rethinking with brms by Solomon Kurz](https://bookdown.org/connect/#/apps/1850/access)
- [Tutorial about brms by Rens van de Schoot](https://www.rensvandeschoot.com/tutorials/brms/)
